job_title: Office Assistant in Bronx, NY
pros: The college is only around four thousand students but the resources provided by such a small institution are incredible. It seems like all the offices on campus are interconnected in one way or another, and it is definitely a much more close-knit community than the larger schools in the area. No matter what office you're working in everyone knows each other and everyone is easily approachable.
cons: The location of the school is the only downside I can see but its a double-edged sword. Its nice to be away from the super hustle and bustle of the city and campus is beautiful, but if you're commuting via public transportation there's only one subway line (1 Train) and only a few bus routes that run in the area.

job_title: Advancement Officer in Bronx, NY
pros: Great place, wonderful people. Engaging environment. The educational and cultural activities for all members of the community, faculty,staff administration , students etc allow you to experience different events that you would not normally try. The Senior Management staff go out of their way to welcome you to the College
cons: Due to size limited advancement in your field from within.
